s3r_kin module¶

class s3r_kin.kinematics(link_lengths_=[0.88, 0.88, 0.84])¶

Bases: object

A class used for describing the kinematics of the leg-structure of a quadruped.

fk(t1, t2, t3)¶

This method performs forward kinematics for the leg-structure. Args:

theta_1 (float) : angle of joint_1 theta_2 (float) : angle of joint_2 theta_3 (float) : angle of joint_3
Returns:
x : x-coordinate of end-effector y : y-coordinate of end-effector z : z-coordinate of end-effector
ik(p, q, r)¶

This method performs inverse kinematics for the leg-structure. Args:

x (float) : x-coordinate of end-effector y (float) : y-coordinate of end-effector z (float) : z-coordinate of end-effector
Returns:
theta_1: angle of joint_1 theta_2: angle of joint_2 theta_3: angle of joint_3
